query:
ALTER TABLE aec_detected_errors 
ADD COLUMN first_occurrence timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER user_context,
ADD COLUMN last_occurrence timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER first_occurrence,
ADD COLUMN occurrence_count int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER last_occurrence,
ADD COLUMN resolved_at timestamp NULL AFTER status;
